entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0017 is not proposed in top-level code #61066
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio freezes even more when bulk undoing hundreds or more actions #61063

Closed

  • [C# 9] IDE0017 is not shown for short constructor call #60982
    Backlog
  • [EnC] Fail to apply updates to a partial method that contains a lambda #60804
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use property pattern #61062
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61060
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61059
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61058
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Prevent EnC error when changing partial methods with lambdas #61039
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Fix double-click on inline-hints for 'var' #61053
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix nullability of source link service #61037
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add feature to show users what global-usings are in scope at the top of a file. #60893
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61061
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61072
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61071
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #61070
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61068
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Treat some nint/nuint conversions as standard conversions #61034
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, 17.3
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
